lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Louis Bell/Brian Lee/Austin Post/Billy Walsh/Jeffery Williams/Jessie Lauren Foutz/Val Blavatnik
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Louis Bell/Brian Lee/Austin Post/Billy Walsh/Jeffery Williams/Jessie Lauren Foutz/Val Blavatnik
[00:14.27]Me and Kurt feel the same, too much pleasure is pain
[00:18.33]My girl spites me in vain, all I do is complain
[00:21.47]She needs something to change, need to take off the e-e-edge
[00:25.85]So f*ck it all tonight
[00:27.95]And don't tell me to shut up
[00:31.50]When you know you talk too much
[00:34.84]But you don't got s**t to say (Say)
[00:38.97]I want you out of my head
[00:41.96]I want you out of my bedroom tonight (Bedroom)
[00:45.38]There's no way I can save you (Save you)
[00:48.43]'Cause I need to be saved too
[00:51.72]I'm no good at goodbyes
[00:53.75]We're both actin' insane, but too stubborn to change
[00:56.71]Now I'm drinkin' again, 80 proof in my veins
[00:59.81]And my fingertips stained, looking over the e-e-edge
[01:04.13]Don't f*ck with me tonight
[01:06.34]Said you needed this heart, then you got it (Got it)
[01:09.51]Turns out that it wasn't what you wanted (Wanted)
[01:12.60]And we wouldn't let go and we lost it
[01:15.69]Now I'm a goner
[01:17.35]I want you out of my head (Head)
[01:20.63]I want you out of my bedroom tonight (Bedroom)
[01:24.09]There's no way I can save you (Save you)
[01:27.09]'Cause I need to be saved too (Saved too)
[01:30.49]I'm no good at goodbyes
[01:32.11]I want you out of my life
[01:33.46]I want you back here tonight
[01:34.90]I'm tryna cut you, no knife
[01:36.47]I wanna slice you and dice you
[01:38.42]My heart gets  possessive, it got you precise
[01:41.67]Can you not turn off the TV? I'm watchin' a  fight
[01:44.80]I flood the garage, blue diamond, no shark
[01:48.00]Your Barbie life doll, is Nicki Minaj
[01:51.32]You don't need a key to drive, your car on the charger
[01:54.49]I just wanna see the side, the one the unbothered (Yeah)
[01:57.80]And I don't want ya to never go outside (Outside)
[02:00.64]I promise if they play, my ****** slidin' (Slidin')
[02:04.12]I'm ******' her, and the tour bus still ridin' (Ridin')
[02:07.21]Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[02:08.85]I want you out of my head (Head)
[02:11.71]I want you out of my bedroom tonight (Bedroom)
[02:14.92]There's no way I can save you (Save you)
[02:18.48]'Cause I need to be saved, too (Saved, too)
[02:21.59]I'm no good at goodbyes
[02:23.28]Goodbye, goodbye, goodbye (Bye, bye)
[02:27.11]Goodbye, goodbye, goodbye (Bye, bye)
[02:30.23]Goodbye, goodbye, goodbye (Bye, bye, bye)
[02:34.62]I'm no good at goodbyes
[02:36.35]Goodbye, goodbye, goodbye (Bye, bye)
[02:39.68]Goodbye, goodbye, goodbye (Bye, bye)
[02:43.06]Goodbye, goodbye, goodbye (Bye, bye)
[02:47.17]I'm no good at goodbyes
tlyric:
[00:14.27]我和kurt cobain（已故摇滚巨星）感同身受，太多的快乐反而是种痛苦
[00:18.33]我的女孩恨我入骨，我也只是抱怨而已
[00:21.47]她需要有些改变，需要把棱角磨掉
[00:25.85]所以今夜就索性艹翻一切
[00:27.95]别叫我闭嘴
[00:31.50]你知道你才是说的太多
[00:34.84]又半点屁用没有
[00:38.97]我要你滚出我的脑海
[00:41.96]要你今晚就滚出我的房间
[00:45.38]我根本无法拯救你
[00:48.43]因为连我自己也需要被拯救
[00:51.72]我并不擅长说再见
[00:53.75]我们都如此疯狂，却又固执得不肯改变
[00:56.71]现在我又开始滥饮，血管里流的都是烈酒（80 proof指40%酒精浓度的酒）
[00:59.81]手上满是污垢，我开始望向边缘
[01:04.13]今晚都别来惹我
[01:06.34]你说你想要我的真心，接着你如愿以偿
[01:09.51]最后发现这根本不是你想要的
[01:12.60]我们无法释怀，开始失去理智
[01:15.69]现在我已一败涂地
[01:17.35]我要你滚出我的脑海
[01:20.63]要你今晚就滚出我的房间
[01:24.09]我根本无法拯救你
[01:27.09]因为连我自己也需要被拯救
[01:30.49]我并不擅长说再见
[01:32.11]我要你离开我的生活
[01:33.46]我要你今晚回到我的身边
[01:34.90]我想要把你“劈”开，用的可不是小刀
[01:36.47]想要长驱直入，把你填满
[01:38.42]占有欲越来越强
[01:41.67]你能不能别把电视关掉？我在看格斗比赛
[01:44.80]我的garage表上镶满钻石，用的都是蓝钻
[01:48.00]你就像个芭比娃娃，像麻辣鸡一样
[01:51.32]不需要钥匙才能驾驶，你的车电力十足
[01:54.49]我只是想看看另一种生活，不被打扰的那种
[01:57.80]我也不是想要你永远不出去抛头露面
[02:00.64]我保证如果他们敢瞎胡闹，我的兄弟们马上会动手
[02:04.12]巡演大巴继续开车，我也在她身上“开车”
[02:07.21]
[02:08.85]我要你滚出我的脑海
[02:11.71]要你今晚就滚出我的房间
[02:14.92]我根本无法拯救你
[02:18.48]因为连我自己也需要被拯救
[02:21.59]我并不擅长说再见
[02:23.28]再见，再见，再见
[02:27.11]再见，再见，再见
[02:30.23]再见，再见，再见
[02:34.62]我并不擅长说再见
[02:36.35]再见，再见，再见
[02:39.68]再见，再见，再见
[02:43.06]再见，再见，再见
[02:47.17]我并不擅长说再见
